rath.libxml

Class LibXml

  • java.lang.Object
    • rath.libxml.LibXml

  • public class LibXml
extends Object

    This class includes various static method for parsing and building XML document.

    Author:
    Jang-Ho Hwang, rath@xrath.com

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultJAXPImplementation

        public static void setDefaultJAXPImplementation()

        Convenience method for registering JAXP implementations of libxml2-java as default DocumentBuilderFactory and SAXParserFactory.

        Invoking this method is equivalent of followings

        System.setProperty("javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory", "rath.libxml.jaxp.DocumentBuilderFactoryImpl"); System.setProperty("javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory", "rath.libxml.jaxp.SAXParserFactoryImpl");

      • createDocumentBuilderFactory

        public static DocumentBuilderFactory createDocumentBuilderFactory()
        Create JAXP compatible DocumentBuilderFactory instance.
        Returns:
        created DocumentBuilderFactory instance

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • createDocument

        public static Document createDocument()
        Convenience method for Document.create(String)
        Returns:
        newly created document instance.

      • parseFile

        public static Document parseFile(File file)
                          throws IOException
        Parse the content of the given file as an XML document and return a new DOM object. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the File is null.
        Parameters:
        file - The file containing the XML to parse.
        Returns:
        A new DOM document object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any IO error occur.

      • parseString

        public static Document parseString(String data)
        Parse the content of the given data as an XML document and return a new DOM object.
        Parameters:
        data - The string containing the XML to parse.
        Returns:
        A new DOM document object.

      • parseSystemId

        public static Document parseSystemId(String systemId)
                              throws IOException
        Parse the content in the given systemId as an XML document and return a new DOM object.
        Parameters:
        systemId - a URL containing XML document. file:sample.xml indicates sample.xml file in the current directory, and can also be combined with jar protocol.
        Returns:
        A new DOM document object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any IO error occur.

      • parseInputStream

        public static Document parseInputStream(InputStream in)
                                 throws IOException
        Parse the content of the given InputStream as an XML document and return a new DOM object. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the InputStream is null.
        Parameters:
        in - InputStream containing the content to be parsed.
        Returns:
        A new DOM document object.
        Throws:
        IOException - If any IO error occur.

      • parseSAX

        public static void parseSAX(String data,
            SAXHandler handler,
            boolean recovery)
        Parse the content of the string as XML using the specified SAXHandler.
        Parameters:
        data - The string containing the XML to parse.
        handler - The SAX handler to use.
        recovery - Whether work in recovery mode or not, tries to read not well formed document.

      • parseSAX

        public static void parseSAX(String data,
            SAXHandler handler,
            boolean recovery,
            SAXHandlerEngine engine)
        Parse the content of the string as XML using the specified SAXHandler and engine.
        Parameters:
        data - The string containing the XML to parse.
        handler - The SAX handler to use.
        recovery - Whether work in recovery mode or not, tries to read not well formed document.
        engine - The SAXHandlerEngine to use.

      • parseSAX

        public static void parseSAX(File file,
            SAXHandler handler,
            boolean recovery)
        Parse the content of the file as XML document using specified SAXHandler.
        Parameters:
        file - The file containing the XML to parse.
        handler - The SAX Handler to use.
        recovery - Whether work in recovery mode or not, tries to read not well formed document.

      • parseSAX

        public static void parseSAX(File file,
            SAXHandler handler,
            boolean recovery,
            SAXHandlerEngine engine)
        Parse the content of the file as XML document using specified SAXHandler and engine.
        Parameters:
        file - The file containing the XML to parse.
        handler - The SAX Handler to use.
        recovery - Whether work in recovery mode or not, tries to read not well formed document.
        engine - The SAXHandlerEngine to use.

      • parseSAXSystemId

        public static void parseSAXSystemId(String systemId,
                    SAXHandler handler,
                    boolean recovery)
                             throws IOException
        Parse the content located in specified systemId as XML document using specified SAXHandler.
        Parameters:
        systemId - The system identifier which indicates location of XML document as URI.
        handler - The SAX Handler to use.
        recovery - Whether work in recovery mode or not, tries to read not well formed document.
        Throws:
        IOException - If any IO error occur.

      • parseSAXSystemId

        public static void parseSAXSystemId(String systemId,
                    SAXHandler handler,
                    boolean recovery,
                    SAXHandlerEngine engine)
                             throws IOException
        Parse the content located in specified systemId as XML document using specified SAXHandler and engine.
        Parameters:
        systemId - The system identifier which indicates location of XML document as URI.
        handler - The SAX Handler to use.
        recovery - Whether work in recovery mode or not, tries to read not well formed document.
        engine - The SAXHandlerEngine to use.
        Throws:
        IOException - If any IO error occur.

      • compileXPath

        public static XPathExpression compileXPath(String expr)
        Compile an XPath expression for later evaluation. If expression is null, a NullPointerException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        expr - The XPath expression.
        Returns:
        Compiled XPath expression.
